overview: They were so close to finally getting their freedom. So close to getting out of the drug business for good, until an outback cocaine deal with a notorious criminal gang goes sideways. Now, in order to make amends to their cruel and unforgiving boss, a trigger-happy Tom Carter and a methodical Lewis Mikeson must set aside their differences to pull off a secretive bank heist. The catch? They only have a week to do it.
title: Loose Ends
